text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7e0868efcf094f2cc59fa4e18af3a8dc7aedd64f|patch 8.2.0602: :unlet $VAR does not work properly>
patch 8.2.0602: :unlet $VAR does not work properly

Problem:    :unlet $VAR does not work properly.
Solution:   Make ":lockvar $VAR" fail.  Check the "skip" flag.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0602: :unlet $VAR does not work properly · vim/vim@7e0868e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0602: :unlet $VAR does not work properly · vim/vim@7e0868e
attachments.text: Problem: :unlet $VAR does not work properly. Solution: Make ":lockvar $VAR" fail. Check the "skip" flag.

patch 8.2.0605: Vim9: cannot unlet an environment variable

Solution:   Implement unlet for $VAR.

patch 8.2.0607: gcc warns for using uninitialized variable

Problem:    Gcc warns for using uninitialized variable. (John Marriott)
Solution:   Set name_end also for environment variables.
